meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a badass.
meanings.sent1: The motorcycle gang had a badassed look with their leather jackets and tough demeanor.
meanings.sent2: She wore a badassed leather jacket to the concert.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy tried to act badassed by growling at a big dog.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in a badassed formation, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The badassed hero saved the town from the evil villain.

meanings.sent1: The badassed wrestler entered the ring with a fierce expression.
meanings.sent2: The badassed biker revved his engine, ready to race.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten thought it was badassed when it puffed up its fur.
meanings.sent4: The badassed lion roared, asserting its dominance over the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The badassed warrior faced the enemy army without fear.

meanings.definition: Exhibiting a fearless or rebellious attitude.
meanings.sent1: The badassed teenager stood up to the school bully.
meanings.sent2: The badassed rock star smashed his guitar on stage.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel looked badassed as it stole a nut from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The badassed thunder rumbled through the night, challenging anyone to defy its power.
meanings.sent5: The badassed pirate sailed the seas, unafraid of any danger.
